Message:
A messenger came to us
from the People of the Stone,
who had long fought us
for control of our land.

Their demand—
to hand me over to them...
Hah! Just thinking about it
makes my fur bristle.

They sever trees
clear down to their roots,
build giant homes of stone,

needlessly slaughter animals—
as if I would ever heel
before the likes of them!

For now, I captured the messenger
and held a meeting to decide
what to do with her, but...

“I should just kill
that messenger girl.
What’s there to hesitate for?”

But, the ones who
took us in resisted, saying,
“If anything happens to that girl,
the People of the Stone could
use it as an excuse to invade us.

That’s all the more reason
we should try to remain...
diplomatic.”

The People of the Stone
have managed to overtake
the surrounding settlements.
But, even if they outnumber us...

“I don’t care how many
of them there are—
I’ll tear them apart
with these fangs!”

“But, it’s far too dangerous!
If anything were to
happen to you...!”

Why does everyone treat me
as though I’m weak...?
